Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: EAMON CS 1.7 GENERAL HELP.

1. Commands may be abbreviated on the left or right side. Examples: "A DR" or "A GON" for ATTACK DRAGON, "REQ RAY FROM AL" or "REQ GUN FROM IEN" for REQUEST RAY GUN FROM ALIEN, "PUT PUM IN LAR" or "PUT PIE IN OVEN" for PUT PUMPKIN PIE IN **090

2. Sometimes items may be in a room but won't show up until you EXAMINE them. Pay close attention to all descriptions. Note: LOOK only repeats the room description and -nothing- else. Use EXAMINE to, well, examine things. **091

3. Before you can manipulate items that are inside of, under or behind other items, you must REMOVE them from that item. There is no REMOVE ALL command, but if you ATTACK a (breakable) container, all of its contents will be emptied to the **092

4. Type SAVE and a number for a desired save position to Quick Save (save without having to verify). Adding a description will rename that slot. Examples: "SAVE 2" or "SAVE 5 Dark Room (NO GRUES)". Also works with RESTORE. (Type RESTORE 1, etc.)

5. You can INVENTORY companions (normally anyone whom, when you SMILE, smiles back at you) to see what they are carrying and wearing. You can then REQUEST those items from them. You can also INVENTORY certain containers to get a list of contents.
6. If you GIVE food or a beverage to a friend, they will take a bite or drink and give it back to you.

7. To give money to someone, type GIVE and an amount. For example, GIVE 1000 TO IRS AGENT would pay 1000 gold coins to the nice IRS Agent. In most standard adventures, if you GIVE 5000 or more, a neutral monster will -usually- become your friend.
8. The POWER spell has been known to have strange and marvelous effects in many adventures. When all else fails (or just for fun) try POWER.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: EAMON CS 1.7 NEW COMMANDS.
1. The GO command allows you to travel through any door/gate you encounter, including those that are free-standing (not associated with a room directional link).

2. The SETTINGS command allows you to change a variety of configuration options, which are persisted across saved games. The settings available and their effects on gameplay can vary between adventures, so trying this command is usually helpful.

3. The LOOK, EXAMINE, REMOVE and PUT commands have been enhanced to work with prepositions. You can LOOK or EXAMINE [in|on|under|behind] [container] to get a list of contents and then REMOVE or PUT [item] [in|on|under|behind] [container] **093

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: Read me! (Special notes about this adventure.)
1. Eamon CS Note: These excellent hints are courtesy of Eamon Deluxe.
2. The Stronghold of Kahr-Dur does not use any embedded artifacts.

3. You may save time (and excess typing) during your adventuring by not trying to EXAMINE any artifacts that aren't already listed as being in the room. The extra items mentioned in the descriptions are there for mood and "flavor" only.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: What do I do in the library?
1. Did you OPEN (or ATTACK) the cabinet in the administrative office and REMOVE its contents?
2. WEAR GLASSES and then EXAMINE BOOKSHELF to reveal a hidden passage.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: How do I open the western door?
1. You can't open it until you have explored the map much further.
2. You will find a dark guard in a large clearing in the woods; he is carrying a leather pouch which has the key to the door inside of it.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: Is there anything special in the King's quarters?
1. WEAR GLASSES (see the hint about the library if you don't have them) and then OPEN or EXAMINE the ARMOIRE.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: What do I do with the cauldron?
1. READ the SPELL SCROLL, it will tell you exactly what to do.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: It's dark!
1. LIGHT the WHITESTONE (see the hint about the library if you don't have it).

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: How do I open the portcullis?
1. You must follow the instructions on the spell scroll.
2. Once it is active (and you are in the room with the portcullis), SAY KNOCK NIKTO MELLON and then cast the POWER spell and it will open.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: How can I enter the forest?
1. You must GET AMULET of Courage (which is carried by the goblin chieftain in the room full of goblins). Once you have it, WEAR AMULET and you will be able to enter Tangledoom Forest.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: How can I get down into the pit?
1. See the hint about opening the western door.
2. Once you have the key, backtrack to the western door and open it. Head west and WEAR BOOTS (of Levitation). As long as they are worn, you can safely climb in and out of the pit.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: Can my friends climb into or out of the pit?
1. Yes. Use the POWER spell to transport them.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: What do I do about the lich?
1. Trying to ATTACK or BLAST him will prove pointless. Did you listen to what he said when you first entered the room?
2. SAY I WILL FREE YOU and he will tell you some magic words. If you SAY those words, he will be freed from his imprisonment.
3. SAY BARADA LHAIN to set him free. (He will also give you the Wizard's Helm which you must have to successfully complete the game.)

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: How do I defeat the Necromancer?
1. Did you manage to climb down into the pit and set the lich free?
2. The lich gave you something of vital importance.
3. You must WEAR the HELM that the lich gave you and then only use your BLAST spell to attack (all other weapons are ineffective against him).

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: What do I have to do to successfully complete the Quest?
1. You must 1) Dispatch the Necromancer; 2) FREE Lady Mirabelle; 3) Make your way back to the entrance, exiting the game with Lady Mirabelle still alive and in the same room as you.

Simple.name: Question
Simple.value: Cheat code. (SPOILER ALERT!)

1. Stronghold of Kahr-Dur uses a fun and devious little routine which adjusts the Hardiness of most monsters according to the strongest weapon that you bring with you. So, if you enter with a superhuman character, you will be met with superhuman foes.
2. A cheat code was added for testing purposes and has been left in the game: To scale the monsters back down to a standard level of toughness, SAY *BRUTIS at any time.
